long_description: This redesigned towline now features a quick-release belt that can be tucked into an exterior pocket, turning it into a deck-mounted towing system! Comes with a stainless-steel carabiner for anchoring and 30 feet of floating 1/4'' polypropylene rope. Quick-release strap and buckle system lets you easily release the tow line in an emergency. Main pocket , float and quick-release toggle are marked with reflective tape for easy identification in low-light conditions. Built-in shockcord allows smooth, effective towing without tangling.
short_description: This redesigned towline now features a quick-release belt that can be tucked into an exterior pocket, turning it into a deck-mounted towing system!
